title: Alex Vando Mens Golf Shirt Moisture Wicking Quick-Dry Print Performance Polo Shirts for Men
description: Material: Our Performance Mens Golf Shirts are made from 90%Polyester 10%Spandex, Light Weight, UPF40+, Quick Dry, Moisture Wicking, Soft, Silky Touch, Breathable and Cool to wear.
True US size: Fits true to size, based on US regular fit golf polo shirt spec., The fit provides plenty of room for moving around yet they still have a fitted look.

Fashion Style: The all over print fashion 4-way stretch fabrics are comfy to wear, and the solid color contrast piping trims on collar band provides a stylish and decent look, the light weight tech men's polo shirt dries rather quickly, suitable for Spring, Summer and Autumn.
Occasion: Quick dry short sleeve polo shirts are great for golf, tennis, hiking, fishing and other sports, also good for home and around the house.

Warm Tips: Our digital print golf shirts for men last long and well made, great value. Easy care, machine wash acceptable, fantastic coming out of the laundry and dryer, good enough to be a sports shirt or business casual.
